name: Magnets (itch) (MK)
description:
A game for the spacejam.

A game about using your bad magnets.

It's also a puzzle game. So if u can't find the exit search for it.

Objective

Return your magnets to the golden podium. Every level has a door/room at the end.

Mechanics

use the left mouse btn to push black metal tingis, the right mouse btn to pull them.

Throw the magnets via q or e. Depends on the side. And fly yourself into it via the left mouse button. Only if a magnet is stuck somewhere. The magnet auto moves towards darker squares or metal so called.

Use every kind of broken thing to get the best time.

Magnets are kinda jonky.
